sourceMeaningMnemonic: You want to have a quaint <radical>cottage</radical> <radical>wedding</radical>, so you have to go to the cottage wedding <kanji>shop</kanji> to get everything you need. This shop is the only place you can buy everything you need. It's not like you can make a cottage from scratch!
meaningInfo: Picture yourself walking into the cottage wedding shop. Look at all the different cottages you get to choose from. And there's wedding cake too?! This shop has everything!
readingMnemonic: You're browsing everything in the <kanji>shop</kanji> when a garden <reading>hoe</reading> (<ja>ほ</ja>) catches your eye. Yes. This will make your cottage wedding the absolute best one. The hoe will give you away at your wedding.
readingInfo: Imagine walking around the shop and then falling in love with a hoe with pretty tassels and flowers attached to it. Yes, it's only for decoration, but you're going to buy and use it during your cottage wedding.
